title: Great Location and Service
text: I stayed six nights for a conference held at the hotel. The location could not be better, right on the "Magnificent Mile," near the Omni and Peninsula hotels. The service and staff attitude was among the best in any American hotel I've experienced. The room was renovated, spotless, and comfortable, with flat-screen TV, etc. The only problem, and they forewarn you about this on the web site, is that this is a historical hotel. The the consequence is that the rooms, though renovated, are quite small by contemporary American standards, rather like a hotel in Paris or Tokyo. And I was disappointed that there was no coffee machine in the room. Otherwise, the stay was great. Recommended!
